name: Dream Pinball 3D II
summary:
The cancelled sequel to Dream Pinball 3D targeting the next generation of hardware of the original.

As well as new tables, it was going to introduce a clever slow-motion function that enables the player to master that particularly difficult skill shot and features a full list of varied mini-games that can be unlocked in single player experience. Thus, adding an element of progression and immersion that is unrivalled in high score games!
